turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Morning! Have you considered donating to Save the Children? It's a great organization and doesn't cost much to help a child in need.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I have not. I am not sure I know what Save the Children is.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: It's an  international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries. It has done wonderful things and is a big part of many organizations employee giving drives.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Oh cool. Do they help people here in the USA?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Right now they're concentrating at an international level. Did you know that in the first two months of 2018, over 1,000 children were reportedly killed or injured in Syria alone? They also appeal to stop hunger issues abroad.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes, I know about Syria. I know hunger is a big issue for a lot of people in other countries. Do they provide food for these people?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: They provide whatever is needed. AND, in relation to the US, they are currently working on the Hurricane Lane situation in Hawaii. They are also big on sending girls to schools in other countries.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Sounds like they do a lot of different things for people.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Yes. it's a great organization. You can find out more if you'd like. I can give you their website. How much would you be willing to donate?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I am not sure yet. What is their website?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: URL  Any amount of would be appreciated. They can do a lot of things with your donation.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I will look at the website. Is the donation tax deductible?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Depending on tax laws in your state, it is. You may need to check with your tax advisor. How about donating to sponsor a child in the US?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Do I get anything for donating?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Other than the satisfaction of helping a child in need?!  You will receive a photo with the child you sponsor and can correspond with them if you choose.  How much would you like to donate?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: The photo would be nice, it would let me know and connect with someone I am helping. How do I know my money goes to the cause and not just to the pockets of the people that run it.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: This is a great organization with a very stellar reputation. There are FAQs on the website that can address all of those concerns, which I certainly can understand. How about a donation of $25 to start?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: How long has Save the Children been helping people all over the world?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: It varies for different regions of the world. Would you be willing to start your donation today, while we're talking?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: yes I can donate. I don't have much. How about .25?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: If you think $.25 will get a child fed, we can do that. However, I think $25 would be more beneficial and it would go to so many good causes.
